immunity_markdown: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

<title level="1" pfs="">[Cephal Lorentus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2306)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Cephal Lorentus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2306)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 280</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +17, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +6

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 dagger_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [_ring of wizardry I_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=462), tattered robes

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 140
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 10, piercing 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing plus 4d6 negative

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 29, attack +20
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333)
- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
- **4th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256)
- **5th**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272)

**Feasting Bite**   If Cephal critically succeeds at a jaws Strike against a foe or successfully hits a helpless foe with a jaws Strike, he gnaws upon the foe's flesh and drains its life force to bolster his own health. This restores 3d6 HP to Cephal (he gains any excess HP as temporary HP, and also becomes [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) 1 during his next turn; he may use his extra action only to make a jaws Strike).Feasting Bite; If Cephal critically succeeds at a jaws Strike against a foe or successfully hits a helpless foe with a jaws Strike, he gnaws upon the foe's flesh and drains its life force to bolster his own health. This restores 3d6 HP to Cephal (he gains any excess HP as temporary HP, and also becomes quickened 1 during his next turn; he may use his extra action only to make a jaws Strike).

</column>
name: Cephal Lorentus
